# Share a Data View

**Data-Krauti** has a built-in function that allows you to **share a data view** with others.

When you've loaded data from a publicly available data source, you can create a URL with the appropriate query parameters to easily reproduce the data view.

By clicking the **share button**, you will see the following dialog, where you will find both the long and short forms of the URL to share:

![](.\pics\share.png)

> #### please note
>
> **You cannot share views of local data**.
